title: Worked Example: Real-Time Spectral Action on T4 and S3xS1
description: This repository contains the reproducible Jupyter notebook and supplementary data accompanying the manuscript 'Emergent Lorentzian Spacetime and Gauge Dynamics from Twistorial Spectral Data'. It reproduces the coefficients a₀, a₂, a₄ of the real-time spectral action for the backgrounds T⁴ and S³×S¹, verifying Appendices B–D.
